recipe.title: Shaved Brussels Sprout Salad with Fresh Walnuts and Pecorino
ingredients: 1 1/2 lb Brussels sprouts (preferably on the stalk), any discolored leaves discarded and stems left intact
2 tablespoons finely grated Pecorino Romano, or to taste
instructions: Holding each Brussels sprout by stem end, cut into very thin slices using slicer. Toss in a bowl to separate layers.
Lightly crush walnuts with your hands and add to Brussels sprouts along with cheese, oil, and lemon juice, then toss to combine. Season with pepper.
